name: Cats Abiding Horribly Bonus Cards
white_cards: Performing the Cleveland Steamer on my dying grandpa.

black_cards.text: Fear leads to anger. Anger leads to hate. Hate leads to _____.
I'm not easily excited, but _____ really makes me moist.
Jesus didn't just resurrect the dead and turned water into wine, he was also very apt in _____.
On the Third day of Christmas my true love sent to me _____.
